titleStmt.title: An epistle of tender love, or cheerful sound by the breath of life to the whole flock of God, who have been eye-witnesses of his glorious appearings in these last dayes.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Thomas, 1634?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: The 26th of the 4th month, 1664. Thomas Green.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' Library, London.
